allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add environment configuration files and update database settings

- Create .env.example files for both root and backend directories
- Update application.yml with API keys and database configuration
- Remove Maven pom.xml to avoid conflicts with Gradle
- Configure database connection for local PostgreSQL (port 5432)
- Add Naver Shopping API configuration
- Update Dockerfile with gradlew permissions fix

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C C:/Users/ad/day-memory commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add AI recommendation history and environment variable configuration

Backend Changes:
- Implement AI recommendation history storage with database persistence
- Add AIRecommendation and RecommendedGiftItem entities for tracking recommendations
- Implement strict gift matching algorithm to prevent duplicate matches
- Add bidirectional sync between AI recommendations and saved gifts
- Fix budget value handling in recommendation result page
- Move sensitive configuration to environment variables (.env)
- Update build.gradle.kts to load .env file automatically

Frontend Changes:
- Fix refetch error in RecommendationResultPage
- Add description field display in EventInfoSection
- Update budget retrieval to prioritize API response data
- Improve gift card and detail page UI

Docker Configuration:
- Add Naver Shopping API environment variables to docker-compose.yml
- Remove obsolete version field from docker-compose.yml
- Create root .env file for Docker environment

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git -C C:/Users/ad/day-memory commit -m "SECURITY: Remove exposed API keys and credentials from example files")

Bash(git -C C:/Users/ad/day-memory commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix logging configuration and remove hardcoded credentials

- Fix duplicate logging path causing Docker container crashes
- Remove path property from logging configuration to prevent logs/logs duplication
- Remove hardcoded API keys and credentials from application-dev.yml
- All sensitive values now use environment variables only

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix logback configuration to remove LOG_PATH dependency

- Remove LOG_PATH property that was causing path duplication
- Use LOG_FILE directly which already contains full path (logs/day-memory)
- This resolves Docker container crash due to logs/logs/day-memory-dev.log path issue

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
